nodes.text: Yolahn Square was an area in the middle of Iziz, the capital city of Onderon, during the Clone Wars. It was located at the foot of the Unifar Temple, the residence of Onderon's king.

Around 20 BBY, under the reign of Sanjay Rash, the planned execution of previous king Ramsis Dendup took place there. Sometime after the failed execution and the Onderon rebels' final victory against the Separatists in the eastern highlands, a funeral for Steela Gerrera was held at this square.
